titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations to carry out the National Aquaculture Act of 1980 for fiscal years 1989, 1990, and 1991.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.
Executive Comment Requested from Interior, Commerce, USDA, EPA.
Referred to Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.
Joint Consideration and Mark-up Session Held by the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment and by the Subcommittee on Oceanography.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Joint Consideration and Mark-up Session Held by the Subcommittee on Oceanography and by the Subcommittee on Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment.
Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Unfavorable Executive Comment Received From USDA.
Reported to House by House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries. Report No: 100-808 (Part I).
Referred to House Committee on Agriculture Sequentially, for a Period Ending not Later than Sep 16, 88.
Referred to Subcommittee on Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture.
House Committee on Agriculture Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Received in the Senate and read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries and Wildlife Conservation and the Environment
committee.name: House Merchant Marine and Fisheries

committee.subcommittee: Department Operations, Research, and Foreign Agriculture
committee.name: House Agriculture

bill.summary: 10/20/1988--Passed House amended. (Measure passed House, amended) Amends the National Aquaculture Act of 1980 to extend the authorization of appropriations through FY 1990.
